title: Hint
text: Resolve the forces and use the equilibrium condition to find the tension in the horizontal strand. Compare it with the tension in the vertical strand.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Resolve the forces to find the tension in the horizontal strand of spider web. Step 2: Use the equilibrium condition to calculate the tension. Step 3: Compare the tension in the horizontal strand with the tension in the vertical strand by finding their ratio. Step 4: Clearly show all calculations and units.
